cio
Class LittleEndianDataOutputStream

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.io.OutputStream
        |
        +--java.io.FilterOutputStream
              |
              +--cio.LittleEndianDataOutputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.DataOutput
public class LittleEndianDataOutputStream
extends java.io.FilterOutputStream
implements java.io.DataOutput

Data output class with low level binary IO operations. The methods in this class write little endian data and accept Java big endian data.

Writing of bytes is unaffected. Also, the char io methods act the same as in the standard DataOutputStream class. So in the case that multiple bytes are written in writeLine() or writeUTF(), the endian order is not switched!

Author:
Donald Gray (dgray@widomaker.com)
See Also:
java.io.DataOutputStream
